name: Spatial Savior Biganger
storyline: You got stuck inside a time vortex, now you need to escape before time ends. Can you move and shoot your way out of this dark labyrinth? To help you through your journey you may find special upgrade gear, better armors or weapons, forgotten by the many warriors that lost their lives in this place. Run against the clock and find the exit, destroying all the opponents that block your way. How fast can you escape? Can you even escape the endless war...
summary: Pilot a giant mecha in the rogue-like world inside a black hole.
